Company Name: University of Applied Sciences and Arts Northwestern Switzerland FHNW
Title: Scientific Assistant

Title: Student Intern
Description: Working on a project regarding Image Segmentation of CT brain scans of patients with brain hemorrhage, using nnU-Net to obtain the Optic Nerve Sheath Diameter and correlate it to clinical factors.

Title: Graphon project with SEB
Description: The project was made as part of my master degree in Machine Learning at KTH for the course "DD2430 Project Course in Data Science" in collaboration with SEB (Skandinaviska Enskilda Banken AB).  It involved the use of graphons for graph generation and graph embeddings.  Link to the github folder here: https://github.com/the-nihilist-ninja/graphon
